content: Jake, I had a similar reaction over the weekend. As an attorney (and husband of a passionate immigration lawyer), my first reaction to the immigration order and its inclusion of LPR’s and visa holders was that the order was clumsily over-broad, and reflected the amateurish nature of the new administration. Upon further consideration, I believe a substantial motivation for the order was to promote racial discord and perpetuate the divide in the electorate. It strikes me that Zorg from the Fifth Element has a substantially similar motivation to Bannon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UkFAcFtBD48&t=3s
